name: Korean Text Corrector Full Development
description: Build a web service that provides Korean text proofreading, copy editing, and rewriting features

tasks.name: Build Backend API Server
tasks.task: Create a Korean text correction backend API using FastAPI. Implement POST /api/correct endpoint that receives {text: string, mode: 'proofreading'|'copyediting'|'rewriting'} and returns {original: string, corrected: string, corrections: [{type: string, original: string, corrected: string, explanation: string, position: {start: number, end: number}}]} format. Implement actual correction with simple rule-based logic.

tasks.name: Improve Korean Correction Engine
tasks.task: Improve the Korean correction logic in the backend. Add functions to check common spelling mistakes (됬→됐, 어떻해→어떡해, etc.), spacing rules, and punctuation usage. Organize rules in a correction_rules.py file.

tasks.name: Frontend API Integration
tasks.task: Modify frontend/components/TextCorrector.tsx to integrate with the actual backend API. Use fetch to call http://localhost:8000/api/correct and display results. Improve error handling and loading states.

tasks.name: Dockerize
tasks.task: Dockerize frontend and backend. Write docker-compose.yml to run everything at once. Frontend on port 3000, backend on port 8000.

tasks.name: Write Test Code
tasks.task: Write test code for backend API. Use pytest to add test cases for each correction mode. Include at least 10 test cases.
